meanings.definition: To make a sound like a person breathing noisily
meanings.sent1: After running, the dog was heezing heavily.
meanings.sent2: She could hear him heezing as he climbed the stairs.
meanings.sent3: The old car engine was heezing like a tired bear.
meanings.sent4: The wind through the trees sounded like heezing giants.
meanings.sent5: The child's laughter turned into heezing gasps after playing tag.

meanings.sent1: His heezing could be heard across the room.
meanings.sent2: The heezing from the other room kept her awake at night.
meanings.sent3: The heezing of the old fan provided a strange lullaby.
meanings.sent4: The heezing of the steam engine echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The heezing of the wind in the trees created a soothing melody.

meanings.sent1: The heezing next to her in the library was distracting.
meanings.sent2: The heezing from the man behind her in line was unsettling.
meanings.sent3: The heezing of the baby in the stroller made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The heezing of the old man on the bench was rhythmic.
meanings.sent5: The heezing of the jogger passing by was loud but determined.
